description:
This mapping demonstrates the Affiliations template transformation from
DataCite metadata schema to DCAT-AP (specifically foaf:Organization).
Based on the CiteDCAT-AP XSLT at:
https://github.com/ec-jrc/datacite-to-dcat-ap
title: DataCite to DCAT-AP Affiliations transformation

Organization.description: Maps DataCite affiliation to foaf:Organization with dct:identifier
Organization.name: Organization

affiliation_name.description: The name of the affiliated organization (element text content)
affiliation_name.name: affiliation_name
